text: Bondini is a 1976 Bangladeshi film produced by Ehtesham and stars Afghan actor Waheed Kader and Bobita. It was his debut film and he plays an American citizen. The song "Isharay Shish Diye" became hit. ==Music== Anwar Parvez composed, Gazi Mazharul Anwar wrote and Sabina Yasmin and Runa Laila sang the songs. *"Isharay Shish Diye" - Sabina Yasmin == References== ==External links== * Category:1976 films Category:Bangladeshi films Category:Bengali- language films Category:Films scored by Anwar Parvez Category:1970s Bengali- language films
title: Bondini (film)
